mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS_USER(ID, ACCOUNT, NAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL, PHONE, DEPT_ID, SEX) VALUES (#{id}, #{account}, #{name}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{deptId}, #{sex})
mapper.select:
SELECT ID, ACCOUNT, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, SEX,PASSWORD,FREEZE_DATE,FREEZE_CAUSE,ALLOW_IP, DEPT_ID FROM SYS_USER where status = '0'
and account like concat(concat('%', #{account}), '%')
and name like concat(concat('%',#{name}),'%')
and email like concat(concat('%',#{email}),'%')
and phone like concat(concat('%',#{phone}),'%')
and sex like concat(concat('%',#{sex}),'%')
and dept_id = #{deptId}
mapper.update: update SYS_USER set status='1' where id = #{id} and status = '0'
update SYS_USER set name=#{name}, email=#{email}, phone=#{phone}, sex=#{sex}, dept_id=#{deptId} where id = #{id} and STATUS = '0'
mapper.select: select u.id, u.account, u.name, u.email, u.phone, u.sex, u.dept_id, d.name freezeCause from SYS_USER u LEFT JOIN SYS_DEPT d ON u.DEPT_ID = d.ID where u.id = #{id}
